body.name: Anteecana No Spill Silicone Bottles Top Spout for Toddlers Kids and Adults, Protects Kids Mouth, BPA Free (Mix - 5 Pack)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 11 mins
features: Safe Material.The water bottle top replacement is made of BPA free top quality silicone, with a soft texture that makes it comfortable for toddlers to suck. The water bottle topper for toddlers is very durable and can be used for a long time. Easy to clean and dishwasher safe.

Parents' Travel Companion.Easy to carry and use. Help toddlers transition from nipple bottles. If you use this water bottle attachment for kids, you don't need to bring a children's water bottle specifically when going out. Simply install this adapter on the water bottle to hydrate the baby. It is easy to carry and use, saving parents time and energy. Also creating a new and enjoyable way of hydration.
Wide adaption. This water bottle top spout fits most water and soda bottles.

Considerable Design.Our Anteecana toddler water bottle toppers can be used together with straws. It Adopts an easy-to-carry ring design. You can make a mark on our water bottle spout adapter if needed. Say goodbye to the messy spills, Our silicone water bottle spouts make hydration so easy.
Splash ＆ Leak Proof.Turn your disposable water bottle into a sippy cup! the plug part and the spouts caps sealing are perfect. Feel ease to put the water bottle in your bags

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy solution to messy spills
reviews.reviewText: These bottle caps work great on the go, when I want to give my toddler a beverage or water out of a regular bottle. No more transferring them to sippy cups, or trying to clean the mess after they insist on drinking right out of the bottle! They fit well on the openings of regular small plastic bottles of water, sprite etc. which are pretty standard. The product is made of soft silicone material and the vibrant colors make them even more fun, we pick a different color each time. I clean them in the dishwasher and it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As anyone with a toddler or preschooler knows, whatever mommy is eating or drinking suddenly becomes a thousand times more interesting. I'm tired of drinks spilling everywhere because my kiddo decided they needed a drink out of mine instead of their own! These are awesome, they fit standard beverage bottles and they're small and lightweight, easy to throw in a purse or diaper bag, and relatively easy to clean. I've even tossed them in the dishwasher. I'll never be without then again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work great for different sizes
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my four year old. When we are out and about it’s so easy to put one of these on a soda or water. They fit every bottle I’ve tried them on so far. Even a 2 liter. And they stay well. If you put them on a carbonated beverage you’ll need to open and release pressure occasionally so it doesn’t turn into a rocket but otherwise they are great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Makes it so easy to have a drink on the go for the littles. This is easy to drink from and seals well. Easy to use and easy to clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for on the go
reviews.reviewText: These go on the bottle very securely, cute colors, and easy to put on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe, ergonomic, reusable
reviews.reviewText: They are made of food grade silicone, BPA free, safe to use. In vibrant colors, they are attractive to kid. They fit any standard water bottles, with an ergonomic design, accommodating the easiness for kids to drink. They are comfortable to sip on, and getting drink out smoothly and easily. The cap seals well, and they are leak free when cap is on. They are easy to clean, and reusable.
